/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, integral to the city's rhythm, can be seen in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Lampposts stand sentinel along the sides of the street, ready to bathe the scene in a warm glow as dusk falls.
